description: The entire DICOM Viewer epic (EPIC-004) is dependent on a single Senior Frontend/Graphics developer. Any delay, departure, or illness of this individual will critically impact the project timeline.
mitigation_strategy: Mandate comprehensive documentation of the rendering architecture and pipeline as a primary deliverable of TASK-4001.
contingency_plan: Engage a pre-vetted graphics programming contractor on short notice to take over development.
monitoring_trigger: TASK-4001 shows slippage of more than 2 days.

description: The current team lacks dedicated DevOps expertise, which aligns with project risk RISK-002. Deployment, configuration of prerequisites, and CI/CD pipeline setup will be slow and error-prone.
mitigation_strategy: Allocate time for the Senior Backend developer to research and build deployment scripts.
contingency_plan: Allocate budget to hire a part-time DevOps contractor for 4-6 weeks during the later project phases.
monitoring_trigger: Initial manual deployment attempts take longer than 1 day to troubleshoot.
